    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Backup.ValidateInvocation validate(BackupTypes.BackupRequest piece)
      Check for backup errors without starting backup.

    • Method Detail

      • validate

        Backup.ValidateInvocation validate(BackupTypes.BackupRequest piece)
        Check for backup errors without starting backup.

        Invocation Result:
        ReturnResult Structure

        Parameters:
        piece - BackupRequest Structure
        Returns:
        instance of Backup.ValidateInvocation which upon invoke executes the above described validate operation. The operation result or the operation error will be stored in the CompletionStageFuture that invoke returns.
        Throws:
        FeatureInUse - A backup or restore is already in progress
        Error - Generic error
